item.title: "Introducing Flappy Color Birds - The Newest Game on Joystick.club
item.description: Match your bird color to the brick to get to the next section.
item.dc:creator: Joystick.club
item.content:encoded:
We are excited to announce the newest addition to the Joystick.club arcade on Polygon and Smartbch - "Flappy Color Birds"! This game is a fresh twist on the classic "Flappy Bird" gameplay, with an added challenge that will keep you on your toes.

In "Flappy Color Birds," players must not only navigate their bird through a series of obstacles by flapping its wings, but they must also match the bird's color to the color of the bricks they are trying to pass through. This added layer of complexity makes the game both more challenging and more rewarding.

https://twitter.com/joystickclub/status/1651855156718501890?s=20

To play "Flappy Color Birds," all you need to do is pay $0.25 in cryptocurrency and start flapping! The more you score, the more $JOY you will earn, which can be used for voting on the direction of the arcade or for minting NFTs. Plus, if you stake your NFTs, you can earn $PTS, which can be used to unlock unique NFTs (coming soon!)

We know that gamers on Joystick.club are always looking for new challenges and experiences, and "Flappy Color Birds" delivers just that. With its simple yet addictive gameplay and unique color-matching twist, we're sure you'll be hooked in no time.

So what are you waiting for? Head over to Joystick.club on Polygon or Smartbch and give "Flappy Color Birds" a try today!

item.title: Joystick.club launches on Polygon

item.title: Joystick.club expanding to multi-chain.
item.description: Joystick.club is monitoring the situation at Coinflex and working on expanding to multi-chain.
item.dc:creator: Joystick.club
item.content:encoded:
We are actively monitoring the situation with regards to Coinflex disabling their users withdrawals and the main bridge to and from Smart Bitcoin Cash.

Coinflex is currently the custodian of the locked bch that pegs bch to sbch at one to one ratio. Given the risk of insolvency at Coinflex, joystick.club will be taking immediate actions to expand to multi-chain as soon as possible to reduce risk to joystick.club and ensure long-term viability of our project irregardless of the situation at coinflex or smart bch.

For those unaware, because coinflex and smartbch team did not segregate the funds held by coinflex into a secondary foundation or entity, it is possible that in an insolvency and bankruptcy event that the locked BCH funds for smartbch could be paid to creditors leaving sBCH users holding a valueless token without access to its layer1 equivalent.

We hope the sBCH community will push Coinflex to move those funds into a new foundation or entity’s multisig controlled by trusted third parties immediately to provide projects and users more assurance that sBCH is fully backed.

Many projects have been affected by this situation. In the last week we have seen a mad dash to the exits due to decisions made by a private company. SmartBCH community needs to prioritize decentralization in order to continue to attract and retain projects. The market reacted poorly to BCH, FlexUSD (which lost its peg, currently trading at $0.59 to the dollar 😬), Flex coin, and even JOY as prices drop across all of smartBCH.

Thanks to the team at Mistswap and blockNG a new bridge does exist that allows you to exit and enter sBCH via BSC (https://blockng.money/#/bridge). Though it should be mentioned that due to the locked main bridge at Coinflex, and premium for bcUSDT due to many people trying to acquire it, exiting may cost you 10-40%. Please bridge carefully if you should do so.

We will continue supporting sBCH throughout these times, but demand both sBCH team and Coinflex to resolve this situation asap and move the locked BCH into a separate entity. ⚠️ We encourage all of our users to push Coinflex and SmartBCH to move the locked 101,382 BCH (https://blockchair.com/bitcoin-cash/address/qptplw8rl7r7nzmze8mnhrdc3guny3p2ng8vz443qu) into a new multisig held by multiple co-signers not involved in the current Coinflex drama. This should have been done before launch of sBCH. It is imperative they do this soon to provide projects like Joystick.club the guarantee that our hard work is not at risk.
The users of sBCH should never been impacted by the poor decisions of a private corporation. We hope the community and leaders in the community will learn from this.

Remember, not your keys, not your coins. Please stay tuned for more details on which chain we will be launching next. Will will update our channel as we learn more.

item.title: Smart Babies arcade game has launched
item.description: Mint Smart Babies NFTs to add them to game play and increase your rewards
item.dc:creator: Joystick.club
item.content:encoded:
We’re proud to announce the launch of our latest arcade game on Joystick.club. The new game, Smart Babies, is an interactive experience in online gaming that takes full advantage of gamefi.

As you may already know, Joystick.club is an online arcade based off years past in-person arcades where you would pay $0.25 cents to play with your friends, win some tickets, and then go to the prize booth and collect your prizes. Joystick.club is the same type of entertainment but using online modern technology.

Smart Babies Arcade

Our latest game is called Smart Babies, where the goal of the game is to level up by surviving with your genetically modified smart baby. It’s Earth’s only chance of survival, and if you collect the babies for the nursery by twisting the knobs in the game, you will win. To play, you just have to match the knob colors to the smart babies bubble color, and try to stay alive!

Smart Babies NFT

The new game also has integrated into it the Smart Babies NFT, which we recently launched as part of our Smart Babies game. The NFT mint has 10,000 smart babies including special rare babies. All of the NFTs can be used in the Smart Babies arcade game, for extra bonus points. You can mint your own Smart Babies here.

Gamefi Arcades

Bringing together the Smart Babies game, using blockchain technology like Bitcoin Cash smart contracts, and adding in our NFT, gives the players a full experience, just like in the past years of playing arcades when you were a kid. Not only does the player get to play fun games and win cool prizes, Joystick.club offers a play-to-earn model. Using crypto, players can pay with Bitcoin Cash and earn not only through game play, but also by collecting prizes (NFTs), then being able to stake and farm them in our NFT staking portal.

Want to try and save the world with your smart baby? Play now and earn some crypto while you’re at it! 🕹️

item.title: Coming Soon: Smart Babies NFT integrated into new arcade game

item.dc:creator: Joystick.club
item.content:encoded:
We plan to release a new game sometime in May 2022 called Smart Babies. The game will be to match the smart baby ball color with the circle. As the game progresses and you level up, it will get harder with more color options and speeds. Winners will win prizes and earn our native JOY token reward which can be used in the JOY ecosystem to mint NFTs and farm them to earn passive income.

Our NFTs are unique collectibles which can also be used in game play for in-game upgrades and bonuses. As part of this, we are minting a whole new NFT series called Smart Babies.

Smart Babies NFT

We are minting 10,000 Smart Babies that are collectible NFTs which can be staked and farmed on Joystick.club. In addition to that, the Smart Babies NFTs will be integrated directly into the new game. So if the player has the NFT in their SmartBCH wallet, you will see the Smart Babies NFT in the game giving players more varieties and game options for an interactive gaming experience.

The new Smart Babies NFT will have seven traits: Skin, Hair, Clothes, Accessories, Face, Background, and Bubble. The NFT drop will have rare specials and it will be 10 JOY to mint the NFTs.

item.title: JOY has been listed on the Verse decentralized exchange
item.description: The Joystick.club token $JOY has been listed on the new Verse DEX
item.dc:creator: Joystick.club
item.content:encoded:
The new decentralized exchange (DEX) called Verse was recently launched by Bitcoin.com. Today, they announced that our very own Joystick.club native SmartBCH token JOY has been added and listed to the DEX for permissionless trading.

Now you can trade your BCH for JOY and vice versa using the decentralized exchange. To start trading on Verse, go to https://verse.bitcoin.com and select your tokens you want to swap, in this case BCH ←→ JOY or JOY ←→ BCH. Set the amounts to swap and then click Swap Preview. Then Approve and Swap with Metamask, which will ask you to confirm.

Watch the video below on the steps to make the swap from BCH to JOY.

You can also get JOY on other DEX’s such as Benswap, Tangoswap, Cowswap, and Mistswap.

More about JOY token

The JOY token is all part of the JOY ecosystem, which is a circular economy where players use crypto to play and earn JOY. The JOY token is the native token for the gamefi arcade Joystick.club. Gamers that play the Joystick.club arcades are rewarded with JOY, which can be redeemed for prizes such as Joybot NFTs, which can be staked to earn passive income, and JOY tokens can also be used to vote in the our governance system.

It’s time to level up! 🕹️

item.title: Joystick.club governance vote: Which arcade game should we release next?
item.description: Make your voice heard in the Joystick.club ecosystem
item.dc:creator: Joystick.club
item.content:encoded:
One of the many advantages of JOY tokens is being able to participate in how Joystick.club is run. The JOY ecosystem is a circular economy of gamers who use crypto to play and earn JOY, and by earning JOY, players can use them to mint NFT prizes, stake NFTs to earn passive income, and also use JOY to participate in governance.

Currently we have a vote out on which game should we release next to the gaming platform. If you have JOY tokens, you can take part in this vote here, and choose which game you like better. Here are the two options:

  1. Verse Systems arcade game - Pilot your ship and collect as many VERSE tokens as you can to progress to the next system. Dodge missiles by changing direction. Stay focused and watch for patterns. Fast paced and very difficult.

  2. Sand Worm arcade game - Eat all humans who dare cross the sand dunes. Avoid rocks and don't eat your tail. The great worm grows with each human it devours. A familiar but challenging game. Those who have played Snake will understand the mechanics immediately.

You can read more about the two games in the governance voting system, where at the bottom of the page you can cast your vote on which game you want us to make and release next. The vote started on April 17, and will end on April 25, 2022.

The way the voting works is when you go to vote, you are signing a cryptographic message from your SmartBCH address which is connected to how much JOY you hold. Depending on the amount you have in custody, will determine your voting power. The more voting power you have, the more weight your vote will carry. When you vote, you should see a similar screen such as this one below:

To submit your vote you need to have JOY tokens. To get JOY tokens, you can play in our online arcade or even just buy them on a decentralized exchange.

Game on! 🕹️

item.title: Joystick.club has officially migrated over to SmartBCH
item.description: A new era in arcade games has begun
item.dc:creator: Joystick.club
item.content:encoded:
We’re proud to announce that Joystick.club has migrated all of our online arcade games to SmartBCH.

For those that aren’t in the loop, SmartBCH is an EVM compatible sidechain for Bitcoin Cash, that provides a lot of new possibilities for gamefi, since SmartBCH has smart contracts, tokens, NFTs, staking, faster block times, low fees, etc. While the Simple Ledger Protocol (SLP) was a great innovation, we have found that SmartBCH is vastly more improved with much more support and opportunities for gamers on the Joystick.club gaming platform.

For gamers that have been using Joystick.club with SLP, you will have until April 30, 2022 to bridge your SLP tokens over to SmartBCH. After that date we will be ending all support for SLP.

How to bridge your JOY or PTS to SmartBCH

You will need a sbch capable wallet and then will need to message "bridge swap {amount} joy 0x2b000youraddress" to SpiceBot on Telegram. Join our Community Telegram if you require additional support.

Gameplay will continue at our SmartBCH Arcade - we invite you to join us there as soon as possible.

Onward! 🕹️

item.title: Welcome to the Joystick.club blog
item.description: This is the Joystick.club GameFi Blog which covers the latest in crypto news including deep thoughts on blockchain gaming
item.dc:creator: Joystick.club
item.content:encoded:
It’s been close to a year since Joystick.club launched, with the ambitious goal of bringing gamefi (game and finance using cryptocurrency) to Bitcoin Cash and the greater crypto world.

What is Joystick.club?

Joystick.club is an arcade style gaming platform powered by the Bitcoin Cash blockchain where you use crypto to play and earn. The obvious is that our platform has fun old school style arcade games which any avid gamer will want to take part in for the joy of playing. However, on top of that, we have gamified the platform making use of cryptocurrency to enhance the gaming experience.

How do we gamify the arcades?

When we say we gamify the arcades, we mean we have several ways to incentivize our users to have a better and more fun experience. For example, we allow gamers to compete for top pole positions and place on our leaderboard. We also make use of Bitcoin Cash smart contracts to issue tokens to gamers, such as our native token JOY. All players get rewarded with JOY which can be used on our platform in various ways such as minting NFTs and yield farming (staking) to earn passive income. JOY is also our governance token.

Non-fungible Tokens (NFTs)

A couple of months ago we announced the official Joystick.club NFT, Joybots. These non-fungible tokens are a collection of robot-like characters designed by Joystick.club, all with unique attributes and rarities. There are 10,000 Joybots which can be minted using Smart Bitcoin Cash. You can even stake your Joybot NFT and farm PTS tokens.

There is even a market of Joybot NFTs that can be bought and sold auction style using the Oasis NFT platform.

Onward

Joystick.club and our entire ecosystem from arcade games, to tokens, and NFTs is growing rapidly. Due to this, we will be updating our users more often here on our blog. Please subscribe to it to stay updated, as new and exciting developments are underway which we will post here soon.

Stay tuned! 🕹️
